articles.content: Cybercriminals have found a way to gain access to people's Google accounts without needing their password, and the new exploit gives hackers continued access to Google services even after a user's pa… [+2382 chars]

articles.title: Forgot your iPhone passcode, here’s how to access your iPhone without resetting the phone - Times of India
articles.description: Apple makes it difficult to access iPhones without the passcode, leaving users locked out. iOS 17 update introduces a passcode reset option for users
